meanings.definition: A person or thing that rushes.
meanings.sent1: The little boy was a fast rusher when playing tag with his friends.
meanings.sent2: The busy rusher quickly finished all his tasks before lunchtime.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was a rusher, always darting around the park looking for acorns.
meanings.sent4: Time was a relentless rusher, never pausing for anyone to catch up.
meanings.sent5: The river was a constant rusher, flowing swiftly through the valley.

meanings.definition: A football player who specializes in running with the ball.
meanings.sent1: The star rusher scored a touchdown with his incredible speed on the field.
meanings.sent2: The team's rusher gained many yards during the game, helping them win.
meanings.sent3: The rusher tripped over his own feet, causing laughter among the spectators.
meanings.sent4: The rusher was like a cheetah, sprinting past defenders effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The rusher's determination was as strong as a charging bull.
